snippet: A new report warned of an increase in killings, abductions, beatings and detentions of journalists, politicians and activists in the country’s east.
abstract: United Nations warns in report that armed groups are increasingly undermining rights and basic freedoms of people in eastern Ukraine; expresses concern at rising number of killings, abductions, beatings and detentions of journalists, politicians and local activists in region.

byline.contributor: David M. Herszenhorn contributed reporting from Kiev, Ukraine, and Somini Sengupta from the United Nations.

lead_paragraph: A new report warned of an increase in killings, abductions, beatings and detentions of journalists, politicians and activists in the country’s east.

headline.main: U.N. Finds Rising Human Rights Violations in Ukraine
headline.print_headline: U.N. Finds Rising Human Rights Violations in Ukraine

keywords.value: Human Rights and Human Rights Violations
keywords.name: subject
